body: At 3rd level, a sea reaver gains a +1 bonus on Acrobatics, Climb, Profession (sailor), Survival, and Swim checks made in aquatic terrain, including aboard a ship or along shorelines. These bonuses improve by +1 every three levels after 3rd. This ability replaces trap sense.
name: Savage Sailor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/Sea Reaver/Savage Sailor
